name: GET OUT (itch) (ralphyua, JamesMusic, Anna Gong)
description:
Welcome to London, 1953. The Cold War is in full swing. You're a lone operative in... a hotel room? Can you uncover and complete the challenges awaiting you?

 ----------

A point-and-click escape room with secrets and consequences. Comes with mysterious toilet jokes and historically accurate propaganda.

Features:

• Atmospheric, original art and soundtrack

Credits:

Programmer: Ralph Y. Wong

Art Director: Anna Gong

Composer & Sound Designer: James Evans
